column16: URL to the EHR PDF (or whatever url is desired) to be found using one of the AVPs below.
List of tags associated with URL. Tags have 2 components: Name and Value
Tag NAME. e.g. OMIM, HGNC, ORPHANET, RxNorm (left open / non-enum for other tag names to come)
Tag VALUE. e.g. OMIM *code*, HGNC *code*, etc
